name: dev.nlebedenco.carambolas.unity
description:
Carambolas is a custom multi-channel reliable UDP protocol implementation for low latency/low bandwidth-delay network applications with soft real-time constraints featured in a collection of .NET Standard 2.0 support assemblies.

This package includes extensions and helper classes for the Unity Engine including a serializable Guid, singleton behaviour, config asset, graphic command line interface, double precision time tracking and more.
